title: India's used car market size to touch $100 billion-mark by 2034: CARS24 CEO
description: The growth trajectory of used car business is propelled by various factors unique to the Indian market, including urbanisation and a growing middle class, which is changing consumer preferences and boosting the demand for affordable mobility solutions, Vikram Chopra said.
